heading: Response to COVID-19 pandemic
desc: Our office has been closed from March 16th to April 6th. Staff is working remotely.

heading: HUQUQ Community Forum
desc: HUQUQ forum scheduled for March 26th has been cancelled. We will be offering one hour of Zoom sharing of the final report in April for small groups. Stay tuned for details.

heading: 10​th​ Anniversary Gala and Women Who Inspire Awards Night 2020
desc: Our 10th Anniversary Gala and Awards Night, scheduled for April 16th, has now been postponed to June 13th. Hold on to your tickets if you have purchased them already. Our event was already 50% sold out so continue to purchase your tickets to avoid disappointments.

heading: Congratulations!
desc: CMW received Rogers Oktoberfest Women of the Year Award in 'Group Achievement' category on October 7​th​, 2019
